description:
Momoko is a girl born from a peach.  With her friends Inugami,Sarugami, and Kijigami, she trains her swordsmanship skills.  Then she hears that demon has appeared in a nearby village!  She decides to protect the villagers. Then she meets some strange people...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 憑依合体! モモキュンソード!!
